channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Wearable sales are flat but ring sales are up 100%, says Oura CEO
item.description: Oura's sensor rings are especially popular with women, who appreciate its Advisor tool and female-focused features.

item.title: Trump: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk has died after being shot at a Utah college event
item.description: The co-founder and CEO of the youth organization Turning Point USA, the 31-year-old Kirk is the latest victim in a spasm of political violence across ...

item.title: Klarna made a solid debut on the New York Stock Exchange with shares up 15% in first day of trading
item.description: Klarna just made its debut as the biggest IPO this year. The Swedish buy-now-pay-later giant sees America as its future—and it's taking direct aim at ...

item.title: Trump, Modi agree to talk in bid to resolve trade impasse
item.description: “I am confident that our trade negotiations will pave the way for unlocking the limitless potential of the India-U.S. partnership,” Modi said.

item.title: Inspector General to review ‘the challenges that Bureau of Labor Statistics encounters’ collecting economic data
item.description: The audit will focus on the agency's reports on inflation and employment, a Wednesday letter to BLS acting commissioner William Wiatrowski said.
